sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import Modal from "react-modal"; import "../style.css"; // Ensure correct stylesheet is linked const ProductSection1 = ({ addToCart, addToWishlist }) => { const [modalData, setModalData] = useState(null); // Product List const products = [ { id: 37, primaryImage: "/images/product/37.jpg", name: "Necklace", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ45,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ44,015", description: "Elegant gold necklace.", rating: 4.5, }, { id: 38, primaryImage: "/images/product/38.jpg", name: "Golden Necklace", name: "Earrings", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ46,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ45,015", description: "Beautiful diamond earrings.", rating: 4.2, }, { id: 39, primaryImage: "/images/product/39.jpg", name: "Gold Pendant", category: "Jewelry", oldPrice: "‚Çπ21,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ20,000", description: "Stylish gold pendant for all occasions.", rating: 4.0, }, { id: 40, primaryImage: "/images/product/40.jpg", name: "Diamond Ring", category: "Rings", oldPrice: "‚Çπ55,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ50,000", description: "A dazzling diamond ring.", rating: 4.8, }, { id: 5, primaryImage: "/images/product/5.jpg", name: "Silver Earrings", category: "Earrings", oldPrice: "‚Çπ16,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ15,000", description: "Elegant silver earrings.", rating: 4.3, }, { id: 6, primaryImage: "/images/product/6.jpg", name: "Gold Bangles", category: "Bangles", oldPrice: "‚Çπ36,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ35,000", description: "Traditional gold bangles.", rating: 4.7, }, { id: 7, primaryImage: "/images/product/7.jpg", name: "Luxury Bracelet", category: "Bracelet", oldPrice: "‚Çπ24,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ22,000", description: "Premium quality bracelet.", rating: 4.6, }, { id: 8, primaryImage: "/images/product/8.jpg", name: "Platinum Chain", category: "Chains", oldPrice: "‚Çπ62,000", currentPrice: "‚Çπ60,000", description: "Stylish platinum chain.", rating: 4.9, }, ]; // Open & Close Modal const openModal = (product) => setModalData(product); const closeModal = () => setModalData(null); return (

Bestselling Products

{products.map((product) => (
{product.category}

{product.name}

{Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => ( ))}

{product.description}

{product.oldPrice} {product.currentPrice}
))}
{/* Modal for Quick View */} {modalData && (

{modalData.name}

{modalData.description}

{modalData.oldPrice} {modalData.currentPrice}
{Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => ( ))}
)}
); }; export default ProductSection1;
